tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE authentication_info (
  auth_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  key_id INT NOT NULL,
  template_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (key_id) REFERENCES encryption_keys(key_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (template_id) REFERENCES biometric_templates(template_id)
);

CREATE TABLE authentication (
    authentication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    key_id INT,
    template_id INT,
    auth_status BOOLEAN
);
